---
title: Convert Base 64 to Base 58
description: Useful script in particular for Squads Tx Builder
---

```tsx 
import bs58 from 'bs58';

const base64Transaction = '';

try {
    // Step 1: Decode Base64 string to raw bytes
    const bytes = Buffer.from(base64Transaction, 'base64');

    // Step 2: Encode the raw bytes to Base58
    const base58Transaction = bs58.encode(bytes);

    console.log("Base58-encoded transaction:", base58Transaction);
} catch (error) {
    console.error("Error:", error.message);
}
```

[Squads Tx Builder](https://docs.squads.so/main/navigating-your-squad/developers-assets/transaction-builder)

[Sign And Send](https://signandsend.vercel.app/)

If you can't be ass'd, just use this [https://supaconvert.vercel.app/]
